title: Cell Phone
question_text: A cell phone company examined the number of subscribers (in millions) over the last $11\text{ years}$ . The data is below. Year Subscribers 2000 0.5 2001 0.8 2002 1.3 2003 2 2004 3.1 2005 4.6 2006 7 2007 10 2008 14 2009 22 2010 34 Use a regression model to determine the number of subscribers in $2011$ based on this data.
